testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "wduUrl" anasayfaya gider...................................passed Then Login Portal elementine kadar asagi iner...............................passed When 3 saniye bekler........................................................passed And Login portala tiklar....................................................passed Then Acilan yeni window a gecer.............................................passed And username kutusuna deger yazar...........................................passed And password kutuuna deger yazar............................................passed Then 3 saniye bekler........................................................passed Then webuniversity login butonuna basar.....................................passed And Popup ta cikan yazinin validation failed oldugunu test eder.............passed And OK diyerek popup i kapatir..............................................passed Then ilk sayfaya geri doner.................................................passed And ilk dondugunu test eder.................................................passed And acilan tum sayfalari kapatir............................................passed
